gamerule.chests.barrelFall.description: Toggle making items fall from containers open on their below side.
gamerule.chests.insertOpen.description: Toggle making items be inserted in containers if open and on the right side.
gamerule.chests.dispenserOpen.descriptio: Toggle making triggered empty dispensers open and close containers they're facing.
gamerule.chests.dispenserOpen.duration.d: Sets how long should a container opened by a dispenser should stay open.
gamerule.chests.lidFling.description: Toggle chests-like containers' lid flinging items lying on them upon opening.
gamerule.chests.lidFling.horizontalPower:
Sets the item flinging horizontal force.
Requires chests.lidFling.
gamerule.chests.lidFling.verticalPower.d:
Sets the item flinging vertical force.
Requires chests.lidFling.
